bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names yu qi ding chuang 魚臍疔 瘡 , fish belly pin-illness sores. Pathological Condition identical with yu qi chuang 魚臍瘡 , fish belly sores. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 31: 此瘡頭破 之黃水出，四畔浮漿起，狹長似魚臍，故謂之魚臍丁瘡 , “When the heads of these sores are broken open they will emit yellow water. On all four sides blisters with thick liquid rise. They are long and narrow like a fish belly. Hence one calls them ‘ fish belly pin-sores ’”.
